scripts.gen-javascript: npm run init && ./node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/bin/openapi-generator generate -i ./salestim-api.yaml -g javascript -o src/javascript
scripts.gen-apex: npm run init && ./node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/bin/openapi-generator generate -i ./salestim-api.yaml -g apex -o src/apex
scripts.gen-csharp-netcore: npm run init && ./node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/bin/openapi-generator generate -i ./salestim-api.yaml -g csharp-netcore -o src/csharp-netcore
scripts.gen-aspnetcore: npm run init && ./node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/bin/openapi-generator generate -i ./salestim-api.yaml -g powershell -o src/powershell2
scripts.gen-nodejs-express-server: npm run init && ./node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/bin/openapi-generator generate -i ./salestim-api.yaml -g nodejs-express-server -o src/nodejs-express-server
